text: Jerry Gabriel León Nazareno (born 22 April 1995) is an Ecuadorian footballer who plays as a defender for Delfín in the Ecuadorian Serie A. ==References== ==External links== *Profile at Copa Sudamerica Official Website Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:C.D. title: Jerry León
